full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHING MCHOG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYE BA'I SMON LAM NOR BU'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYES PA'I SMON LAM 'DI NI DAD BRTZON BLO DANG LDAN PA DKON MCHOG THABS MKHAS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES SKAL MNYAM RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I SLAD DU GO BDE BAR 'BOL RTZOMS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE BO RNAMS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LDAN LUGS BZANG RGYAS PA'I SMON LAM BZHUGS SO,,  ,,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
